page.title: 13GOWY VALLEY CUSTOMS,TOURISM
page.content: {LEGENDS}Cromwell learned that Guilden Sutton was Royalist and sent troops to quell the village but failed to find it because it was hidden in a valley. Church silver is said to have been buried under an oak tree at this time, but has never been found.On marrying a village girl, the bridegroom must pay silver to have a cord removed at the Church gate. {CUSTOMS}Maypole dancing takes place in Guilden Sutton also revival of mummers play "Soul Cakers" oral tradition now recorded. This is a classic mummers play about good & evil acted by a male youth.Main Characters-King George, The Turkish Knight,Doctor,Martha,Paddywack and Dairydought. {TOURISM}Touring caravan camp sites at Meadow Lea Farm & Belle Vue Farm.
